overview:
Michael Henriksen is an Application Engineer at 6Wunderkinder who primarily works on the backend of Wunderkit. He also helped during the development of the Wunderlist web app. His extensive knowledge of advanced object oriented programming and design helps a great deal in developing a solid core for Wunderkit - with a high level of abstraction that makes it easy and fast to work with.

Prior to joining 6Wunderkinder he was a partner in a Danish IT company, developing a resource and booking management application aimed at music houses and creative educational institutions. The system was sold to all major conservatories and music houses in Denmark as well as a few in the Netherlands, Finland and Great Britain. Michael studied IT at Aarhus TECH and functioned as a lead web developer and code architect at Paldam IT.
